sentences.english: The collapse of the Han dynasty was followed by nearly four centuries of rule by warlords.
sentences.chinese: 汉朝灭亡后是长达四个世纪的军阀割据时代。

sentences.english: " Only after the Han Dynasty more than "the Zuo Zhuan.
China's Zhang Heng invented the seismograph during the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 中国的张衡在汉朝时发明了地动仪。

sentences.english: According to legend, during the Han Dynasty, the King of Huainan, Liu An, is especially keen on books about immortals and ghosts.
sentences.chinese: 相传汉朝的淮南王刘安特别喜爱看描写神仙鬼怪的书。

sentences.english: The name of a seismograph invented by the ancient Chinese scientist, Zhang Heng.
sentences.chinese: 中国的张衡在汉朝时发明了地动仪。

sentences.english: In general, China’s painting was flowering after Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，中国的绘画在汉朝就已经成熟。

sentences.english: Han cavalryman were drawn from Chinese living on the frontiers.
sentences.chinese: 汉朝骑兵是从生活在边疆的百姓中挑选出的。

sentences.english: First, you will visit Yumenguan Pass, one of the west gates during the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 先游览玉门关，汉朝的西部门户之一。

sentences.english: China integrity of the system is wearing apparel in the Han Dynasty established.
sentences.chinese: 中国完整的服装服饰制度是在汉朝确立的。

sentences.english: The dynasty lasted more than two hundred years until Wang Mang usurped the throne of Emperor Xiao Ping.
sentences.chinese: 汉朝历时两百余年，到了孝平皇帝，被王莽篡了位。

sentences.english: In Han Dynasty, there was a person who named Ji'An.
sentences.chinese: 汉朝时，有一个叫汲黯的人。

sentences.english: The tradition of “Men’s Day” originated from Han Dynasty and began to draw people’s attention after Wei and Jin.
sentences.chinese: 汉朝开始有人日节俗，魏晋后开始重视。

sentences.english: It was during the Han that artificial ink appeared.
sentences.chinese: 人工墨品的出现在汉朝。

sentences.english: Originated from Han dynasty, Shadow-play becomes popular among ordinary people in Tang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 皮影戏发源于汉朝，唐以后流传民间。

sentences.english: One was Liu Bei, a descendent of Liu Sheng, Prince Jin of Zhongshan during the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 刘备，是汉朝中山靖王刘胜的后代。

sentences.english: It helps people better understand the history of the Han Dynasty .
sentences.chinese: 这些发现帮助人们更好的理解汉朝的历史。

the state of Qin, one of the seven states of the Warring States Period (475-220 BC)
Jin Dynasty (265-420)
